title: Parents who work
creator_credit: Ted Emery, Seven Dimensions and Eve Ash
brief_description: Thomas has a sore throat but is sent to school due to his parents’ commitments at the office. Should Dad or Mum have stayed at home? This program looks at parenting and dual responsibility, the importance of forward planning employers’ attitudes to women with families, how and why employers should help and how to negotiate with a partner.
